question:
You are looking for a full-time job. Write a letter to an employment agency. In your letter:
introduce yourself
explain what sort of job you would like
say what experience and skills you have
Begin your letter as follows: Dear Sir/Madam
text: I am Mr Ravi, with a profound experience in software-related technology from Vancouver. Despite my strong industry knowledge, I have also obtained a graduate degree from a reputed institution.

Since I did my graduation and master's in enterprise resource planning field which related to budget allocation and implementation hence, I would love to do the job in the same field and I strongly believe this would be an added advantage for those who are looking for the great candidate like me.

As you heard, I have worked for multiple companies with phenomenal project work. In addition, I was in Europe for almost four years for one of the best companies wherein I did develop and implemented an end-to-end customer service tool which got impressed everyone in all ways.
I would really appreciate it if you could let me if any additional information is required from my end and look forward to hearing good news from you soon. hope it will come soon.
